content:
The baking soda and water method is a gentle and effective way to clean your oven.

And oh, I can imagine the chaos of a big family dinner! Kitchens can quickly become a mess, especially when there are many people involved. It's great that you're taking the initiative to clean your oven now, even if it's been a while. A clean oven is not only more hygienic, but it also helps with even cooking and prevents any residual flavors from affecting your dishes.

Since you mentioned Christmas, I have to ask: what was the highlight of your holiday dinner? Was there a particular dish that stole the show, or a fun family tradition that you enjoy every year?

And, on a related note, do you have any fun plans or traditions for the upcoming holiday season?
